代理模式

前言:简单点说,就是在一个类中控制对另一个类实例的属性或方法的访问

# -*- ecoding: utf-8 -*-
# @ModuleName: agent
# @Mail: 15717163552@163.com
# @Author: mozhouqiu
# @Time: 2022/4/27 15:27
class Server:
    def __init__(self,name):
        self.name = name

    def run(self):
        print("test")


class Agent:
    def __init__(self,server):
        self.server = server

    def __getattr__(self, item):
        return getattr(self.server,item)

A = Agent(Server("qmz"))
print(A.name)
A.run()
